flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
从狩猎民族的古墓中大量
出土了使用壳上拔下的尖刺
制造而成的长矛。

殻から　抜けた　トゲで　造った
ヤリが　狩猟民族の
古墳から　たくさん　出土する。

Excavation of the tombs of ancient hunting
tribes has turned up many spears tipped with
spikes that had fallen off this Pokémon’s shell.

Nei tumuli di popoli dediti alla caccia sono state
rinvenute lance fabbricate con aculei provenienti
dal guscio di questo Pokémon.

Se han desenterrado numerosas lanzas hechas
con pinchos de la concha de Cloyster. Eran
utilizadas por antiguos pueblos de cazadores.

In Gräbern alter Jägervölker werden oft Speere
ausgegraben, welche aus abgebrochenen
Stacheln seiner Schale gefertigt wurden.

Les archéologues qui explorent les tombes de
chasseurs primitifs trouvent souvent des lances
faites avec des épines tombées de sa carapace.

從狩獵民族的古墓中大量
出土了使用殼上拔下的尖刺
製造而成的長矛。

껍질에서 떨어진 가시로 만든
창이 수렵 민족의
고분에서 많이 출토되었다.

カラから　ぬけた　トゲで　つくった
ヤリが　しゅりょうみんぞくの
こふんから　たくさん　しゅつどする。

飲 込んだ　海水を　後ろへ　勢い　よく
噴射する　ことで　海の　中を　泳ぐ。
トゲを　発射する　仕組 も　同じ。

Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by
swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This
Pokémon shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

Cloyster è in grado di nuotare in mare aperto, ingerendo
acqua dalla bocca per poi espellerla violentemente
a mo’ di propulsore. Questo Pokémon usa lo stesso
metodo per sparare punte dalla conchiglia.

Cloyster es capaz de nadar por el mar. Su técnica consiste en
tragar agua y expulsarla por el conducto que tiene en la parte
trasera. Este mismo sistema es el que usa para lanzar los
pinchos que tiene alrededor de la concha.

Austos kann im Meerwasser schwimmen, indem es Wasser
schluckt und mit Druck wieder herausspritzt. Auf dieselbe
Weise verschießt dieses Pokémon scharfe Stacheln.

Crustabri est capable de se déplacer dans les fonds marins
en avalant de l’eau et en la rejetant vers l’arrière.
Ce Pokémon envoie des pointes en utilisant la même méthode.

들이마신 바닷물을 뒤쪽으로 기운차게
뿜어내서 바닷속을 헤엄친다.
같은 방법으로 가시도 발사한다.

の こんだ　かいすいを　うしろへ　いきおい　よく
ふんしゃする　ことで　う の　なかを　およぐ。
トゲを　はっしゃする　しく も　おなじ。

飲 込んだ　海水を　後ろへ　勢い　よく
噴射する　ことで　海の　中を　泳ぐ。
トゲを　発射する　仕組 も　同じ。

Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by
swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear.
This Pokémon shoots spikes from its shell using the
same system.

Cloyster è in grado di nuotare in mare aperto, ingerendo
acqua dalla bocca per poi espellerla violentemente
a mo’ di propulsore. Questo Pokémon usa lo stesso
metodo per sparare punte dalla conchiglia.

Cloyster es capaz de nadar por el mar. Su técnica consiste en
tragar agua y expulsarla por el conducto que tiene en la parte
trasera. Este mismo sistema es el que usa para lanzar los
pinchos que tiene alrededor de la concha.

Austos kann im Meerwasser schwimmen, indem es Wasser
schluckt und wieder herausspritzt. Dieses Pokémon kann
sich auch verteidigen, indem es spitze Stacheln mithilfe
des Wasserdrucks verschießt.

Crustabri est capable de se déplacer dans les fonds marins
en avalant de l’eau et en la rejetant vers l’arrière.
Ce Pokémon envoie des pointes en utilisant la même méthode.

들이마신 바닷물을 뒤쪽으로 기운차게
뿜어내서 바닷속을 헤엄친다.
같은 방법으로 가시도 발사한다.

の こんだ　かいすいを　うしろへ　いきおい　よく
ふんしゃする　ことで　う の　なかを　およぐ。
トゲを　はっしゃする　しく も　おなじ。

殻が　非常に　硬く
ナパーム弾でも　壊せない。
攻撃するときだけ　開く。

Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered,
even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it
is attacking.

Neppure una bomba può scalfire il suo duro guscio,
che apre soltanto quando sta attaccando.

La concha que lo cubre es extremadamente dura.
No es posible causarle rasguños y solo se abre si lo
atacan.

Sein Panzer ist extrem hart. Es kann nicht
zerschmettert werden, auch nicht durch eine Bombe.
Der Panzer öffnet sich nur, wenn es angreift.

Sa coquille est extrêmement résistante. Rien ne peut
la détruire, pas même une bombe. Il ne l’ouvre que
lorsqu’il attaque.

껍데기가 상당히 단단하여
네이팜탄으로도 부술 수 없다.
공격할 때만 연다.

カラが　ひじょうに　かたく
ナパームだんでも　こわせない。
こうげきするときだけ　ひらく。

潮の　流れが　激しい　海に
生息している　パルシェンの
殻の　トゲは　大きく　鋭い。

Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents
grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

Ai Cloyster che vivono in mari con forti maree
crescono grandi aculei affilati sui gusci.

A los Cloyster que viven en las fuertes corrientes
marinas les crecen largas y afiladas púas en la concha.

Austos, die im Meer mit starker Strömung leben,
werden groß und entwickeln scharfe Stacheln.

Les Crustabri vivant dans des mers aux courants forts
développent des dards sur leur coquille.

조수의 흐름이 격한 바다에
서식하고 있는 파르셀의
껍질의 가시는 크고 날카롭다.

しおのながれが　はげしい　うみに
せいそくしている　パルシェンの
カラのトゲは　おおきく　するどい。

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

Il se défend en fermant sa coquille
et projette des piquants qui
repoussent ses agresseurs.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

Il se défend en fermant sa coquille
et projette des piquants qui
repoussent ses agresseurs.

CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh
tidal currents grow large, sharp
spikes on their shells.

Once it slams its shell shut,
it is impossible to open, even by
those with superior strength.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

It fights by keeping its shell
tightly shut for protection and
by shooting spikes to repel foes.

When attacked, it launches its horns in
quick volleys. Its innards have never been
seen.

Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be
shattered, even with a bomb. The shell
opens only when it is attacking.

It swims in the sea by swallowing water,
then jetting it out toward the rear.
The CLOYSTER shoots spikes from its
shell using the same system.

CLOYSTER is capable of swimming in the
sea. It does so by swallowing water,
then jetting it out toward the rear. This POKéMON shoots spikes from its
shell using the same system.

CLOYSTER is capable of swimming in the
sea. It does so by swallowing water,
then jetting it out toward the rear. This POKéMON shoots spikes from its
shell using the same system.

Even a missile
can't break the
spikes it uses to stab opponents.
They're even hard­
er than its shell.

CLOYSTER that live
in seas with harsh
tidal currents grow large, sharp
spikes on their
shells.

Once it slams its
shell shut, it is
impossible to open, even by
those with superi­
or strength.

For protection, it
uses its harder-
than-diamonds shell. It also
shoots spikes from
the shell.

When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
